text: The 2021 mid-year rugby union internationals (also known as the summer internationals in the Northern Hemisphere) are international rugby union matches that are mostly played in the Southern Hemisphere during the July international window. ==Series== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center" ! style="width=320"| Event ! style="width=70"| Result ! style="width=100"| Victor |- | Argentina v Scotland test series | | |- | Australia v Wales test series | | |- | South Africa v British and Irish Lions test series | | |- | New Zealand v Italy test series | | |} ===Other tours=== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" border="1" ! style="width="100" | Team/Tour ! style="width"390" | Opponents |- | England tour | align=center| – – |} ==Fixtures== ===May=== ===June=== ===July=== ===August=== ==See also== * 2021 end-of-year rugby union internationals ==References== 2021 Category:2021 in North American rugby union July rugby union tests Category:2020–21 in English rugby union
title: 2021 July rugby union tests
